data.title: Will MasterCard (MA) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
data.text: MasterCard (MA) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

data.title: Should You Start Your War-on-Cash Basket With Mastercard?
data.text: Mastercard has been an outperformer ever since its 2006 initial public offering. Here's why it could continue beating the market.
